title: 'Best deodrant'

title: 'Its good but'
body: We all know the age-old smell of Nivea. The roll-on keeps my underarms fresh for 4-5 hours. The only negative feedback is that Nivea is not cruelty-free. I so wish I could continue using Nivea. Please Nivea, can't you be cruelty-free?

title: 'Good product'
body: 'I just loved this product. I cannot say that the fragrance last for 48 hours but yaa it last for 12 hours which is sufficient for me.'

title: 'Safer for your lungs!'
body: This is a quality product from Nivea. It will not make you very fragrant but it can certainly keep the order under control for at least 5 to 6 hours. Very delicate on the skin and does not cause any irritation or itching. All the quantity for the money should have been more because on moderate use it won't last a month.

title: 'Worth if you look for a smooth and fresh scent'
body: The product is fine with a good and smooth scent.. but the scent won't last beyond 6-8 hrs in a person who moderately sweats.
